name: Sibling Pages
author: Kenneth Tyler

sections.description:
• This plugin depends on setting some pages to have the same “parent” page.
  • If page A, B and C all have the same parent page, then the plugin will generate a list of links to page A, B and C whenever you are on any one of those pages, or whenever you are on the parent page.
  • The parent page will be listed first in the list of siblings, then the sibling pages in apha order by page title.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag the “Sibling Pages” widget onto a display area in the ‘widgets’ admin page
sections.changelog:
.01

  • First version of plugin.

.02

  • The parent page is added to list of siblings in the menu. The list is displayed when the parent page is viewed, as well as when one of the sibling pages is viewed.

short_description: Generates and registers a widget that generates a list of links to sibling pages (pages that have the same parent page)
